```
import presentor from 'presentor'

var model = {

  width: '100%',
  height: '100%',

  origin: [10, 10],
  scale: [1.1, 1.1],
  rotation: 0,

  components: [{
    type: 'rect',

    left: 100,
    top: 100,
    width: 200,
    height: 200,

    rotation: Math.PI * 45 / 180,

    class: 'box'
  }]
};

var target = 'presenter';

var style = {
  '.box': {
    backgroundColor: '#FF0000',
    alpha: .5
  }
}

var layers = [{
  type: 'scale-layer',
  positions: ['top', 'left'],
  unit: 'meter'
}, {
  type: 'guide-layer',
  lineWidth: 1,
  strokeStyle: '#FF0000'
}]

var p1 = presentor.create({ target, model, style, layers });
```
